text: Do you have any way to trigger a workflow when a meeting finishes? The only triggers I am seeing are based on when a meeting is booked. I have spotted some workarounds like meeting end date is more than 1 day ago but that would not work for my use case. The final purpose of the wf is to generate a task for the rep to follow up once the meeting is over

I use two workflows for this. I do some delays and feed people back into the original workflow.

I trigger this on meeting booked, â€” use two checkbox properties so I can reenroll them into the different workflows. Took quite a bit to get it figured out
